A localized donation and resale platform can:

  • Reduce waste by promoting reuse of household items.
  • Help people in need access affordable or free resources.
  • Foster community bonding and mutual support.
  • Encourage sustainable living and responsible consumption.

Measurable outcomes:

  • 500+ items reused or donated in the first 6 months.
  • 70% of users engage in at least one transaction.
  • Reduction in household waste by measurable volume.
  • Increased community interaction and satisfaction.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: When people move homes or declutter, they often discard usable items like books, furniture, electronics, or clothing due to the lack of a simple, local platform for donation or resale. This leads to unnecessary waste and missed opportunities for others who may need these items but cannot afford them. There is a need for a community-centric solution that connects people within the same locality to share resources easily and responsibly.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

  • Service Portal – for user registration, item listing, and browsing
  • Record Producer – to collect user details and preferences
  • Catalog Item / Custom Table – for item listings with donation/sale options
  • Flow Designer – to automate grouping, notifications, and voting logic
  • Virtual Agent – for location suggestions and voting interactions
  • Notification Engine – to alert nearby users about new listings and pickup details
  • Performance Analytics – to track reuse metrics, popular items, and user engagement
  • IntegrationHub – for optional map integration and external messaging services
  • Survey Management – for post-transaction feedback and platform improvement
  • Now Mobile (optional) – for mobile access to listings and notifications

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

  • Integration with mapping APIs (e.g., Google Maps) for pickup location coordination
  • Secure data handling for user location and contact details
  • Notification system (email/SMS/push) for real-time alerts
  • Dynamic grouping logic based on pincode
  • Optional integration with payment gateways (for resale transactions)

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

  • Ensuring accurate and safe location-based grouping
  • Verifying item availability and transaction completion
  • Encouraging consistent user participation and trust
  • Managing disputes or issues between users
  • Scaling the platform across multiple regions
  • Ensuring data privacy and secure communication
